website_summaries.verdict: This futon sofabed allows for the flexibility of a futon and the look of leather, without breaking the bank.
pros: Faux leather material is easy to clean
Size and shape are ideal for overnight guests and those tight on space
Splitback allows for only partial reclining
Sturdy and durable, with neutral styling to match décor in any room
cons: Mattress may lose firmness sooner than expected

customer_reviews.title: poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful when assembled. However, one side of it sank in more than the other. There was also a nick in the upholstery. This was because the box was all holed up and torn upon arrival. They were willing to give me a partial refund for the nick. I would have taken it if I were going to use this for an office where I might lie down for a second once in awhile, but for home and overnight guests--no way.
customer_reviews.author: J J.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build, not confident it is going to last very long.
customer_reviews.text: The cushions feel very unsupported toward the middle of the couch, the exact area that one normally sits. The ratcheting back sections are cool, but the angles are a little extreme for me. Maybe I’ll get used to it. It wasn’t too bad to sleep on for a night. I got the Chelsea ottoman too, so I rested my feet on it to stretch out.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie H.

customer_reviews.title: I loved it, you might hate it!
customer_reviews.text: Not soft enough to sleep without some softer support and even seating is not that comfortable. However its very pleasing to the eye and if you purchase the ottomans it complements the looks even better.. Kids wont mind and I don't think anybody will use it as their formal living room items. Is perfect for occasional seating or to accessorize and complement spaces. Your son at collage will love it but your grumpy senior dad will hate it. If you are looking for a grandma soft sofa look someplace else. This is more about aesthetics than practicality.
customer_reviews.author: E. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you wanted in this couch.
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to set up, it looks really clean and really chic. It's not the most comfortable, but with blankets and pillows it makes a great addition to a living room.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Anderson

customer_reviews.title: FALSE AD WEIGHT LIMITE IS NOT ANYWHERE NEAR 600 LBS OR 300 LBS
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY UNLESS YOU WEIGHT LESS THAN 160LBS. This futon's ad stated that it will take up to 600 LBS, IT CAN'T TAKE 300 LBS, I got this piece of futon on June 6, 2017 it lasted to December 21, 2017( 6 MONTHS) when the left front leg and the wood holding it broke off (at the time I was sitting on it with my 300 lbs ). THE MAIN REASON I PURCHASED THIS FROM AMAZON WAS BECAUSE IT STATED "WEIGHT LIMITE 600 LBS.
customer_reviews.author: POSCOE

customer_reviews.title: Fill the need
customer_reviews.text: Served its purpose. Good purchase. Good price. Not really ideal for super long usage.
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this product. I bought it for my husbands video game room though and not even a month later there is unmistakable sagging where he sits on it all the time. It’s also incredibly firm and not that cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Mama ski

customer_reviews.title: looks great in the corner
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. Pros: looks great in the corner. I love the way it folds, and it's very lightweight. Cons: not very comfortable, I always wake up with a sore back.

This is Bad quality and it only lasted one year. This kind of couch is not good if you have a teenager that games on it all the time. Teenagers fingerprints go all over. This went from 5 stars to 2 stars, Sorry but the manufacturer needs to double sew the sitting part if not it will break within a year. ​

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: good for the price. very lightweight, which mean sometimes, it won't stay in one place. I have hardwood floor so it slides around once in awhile. fairly comfortable to sit on but not for sleeping.

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The futon was too firm and not comfortable at all. I got an twin size air mattress to go on top of it, to make it more comfortable to sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: Gary B.

customer_reviews.title: Good for dorm room/den
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this Futon for guest bdrm/den. I think it's better suited for teens or for dorm room. Not as comfortable as traditional sofa. Easily folds down for twin size bed. Would recommend you get a pillow top mattress pad and a memory foam insert before allowing guests to sleep on it for maximum comfort. Contempory design so it fits nicely in 12 x 12 room. Just add a couple fof throw pillows and you're good to go. Not a bad deal for the price. Easy to put together (legs are underneath in zippered pouch).
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Very good item

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but needs more padding.
customer_reviews.text: From the pictures it looks and when I put it together it does look nice. A good contemporary look. Set was also easy. For the most important part the backrest moves back when lean back on it and the cushioning is too thin. It needs to be about double thickness for the padding. Sleeping on it for a bed would be very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang for Buck
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for chilling around. Kinda same feeling if you go out to a lounge and sit. Easy to set up, looks great, def worth $199.00 for a good basic couch. I never slept on it but doesn't look that uncomfortable. If your looking cheap couch for your new place this is it. Its not a sunday game day comfy couch more of a red wine and crackers party couch.

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.title: Does not stand behind product
customer_reviews.text: After 6 mos, the surface started wearing away where we sat the most. The company, nor the Smartguard additional 3-year warranty, would cover this. They both stated normal wear and tear is not covered. So if you plan on purchasing this and want it to last, do not sit or sleep on it! However, Amazon is saving the day by picking it up and giving me a full refund! Thank you, Amazon!! Will never buy another Dorel product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but the screws that hold the plates for ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, but the screws that hold the plates for mounting the feet into were loose and a few were actually stripped. I'm sure this beauty won't last long, but for the price, If I get a year, I'll be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Cre8tive

customer_reviews.title: Awesome piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: The futon was delivered on time and is very easy to set up! took me only 15 minutes. It does not have too much cushion, but I was not expecting it to be a comfortable bed to start with. It looks nice and goes with my furniture. I dint get a chance to use it as a bed so far but will update my review if there is a problem.
customer_reviews.author: jnit

customer_reviews.title: Looks can be decieving
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for less than a year now, first few months it was great, after that it started to wear and now one of the legs got broken simply as I sat on it. Of course, there's no way of fixing it now! I wouldn't recommend this if you plan on using it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Alzahrani

customer_reviews.title: My 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: I am married with a 5 year old son and one on the way, well I grew up poor and I never want my wife or kids to go through what I have been through so I try to give them the best of the best things. I bought this futon for my son's room. He has a bed and also a futon because he has friends over and I find children sharing a bed to be creepy. He loves it and he tries to jump on it but it is firm. I am happy with it. I got my money's worth and his room looks borderline sophisticated minus all the stuffed animals and toys and posters.
customer_reviews.author: theredgiant

customer_reviews.title: Nothing fancy but pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent piece of furniture for the price. I certainly don't expect it to last forever, and I wouldn't purchase it for everyday sleeping. But sitting and occasional sleeping, I think it's a good choice. It doesn't look like leather so don't think you will fool anyone into thinking it's a more expensive piece than it is.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: CRACKED UP 1 YEAR AFTER PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: 1 year after purchase, the material is cracked and peeling off like a horrible sunburn. I've replaced the legs 3 times due to shotty welding. Don't expect anything more than a year of regular use, unless you leave it wrapped in plastic and in the box.
